Question
========

A committee of three students should be formed from six juniors and five seniors. If three names are drawn at random, what is the probability that the committee will consist of all juniors or all seniors?

Answerlist
----------

* 2/33
* 4/33
* 6/33
* 1/3
* 1/2

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2/33: Incorrect
* 4/33: Incorrect
* 6/33: Correct
* 1/3: Incorrect
* 1/2: Incorrect
